review: I love the Amazon firetv stick.  All I did was follow the instructions in the box and setup was completed in 5 minutes.I get a clear picture to everything I have watched so far.The only minor thing, you may lose a connection once in a blue.  Don't panic.  Pull out the firetv stick, wait 30 seconds and stick it back in the hdmi port.  All is good in your world!
